channel.title: YouTube Monetizing
channel.description:
I know there has probably been more than just a few people asking this, but the thread is closed with no reply (im sure for a reason) and i'm just going to ask the usual.
I'm a Lets player on YouTube and I want to know if you will allow free usage of video made from Black Mesa or if you are willing to have a licencing agreement
[INDENT]Greatly appreciated[/INDENT] [INDENT][INDENT]-Flynn Wolff[/INDENT][/INDENT]

item.title: YouTube Monetizing
item.dc:creator: Zen609
item.description:
Flynn - Please don’t make anymore threads regarding this issue.

You need to contact Raminator or cman2k directly and privately.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Monetizing
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
So you want to make a profit out of something the devs themselves can’t make any profit from?

That seems fair.

Read full topic
